message: Dear {{ doc.lead_name }}, thank you for connecting with {% set var = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "full_name") %} {{var}}. We will keep you posted on further movement of your loan application. For more details please visit us at https://www.switchmyloan.in - Team Switch My Loan
name: Call from the Sales Manager
subject: Call from the Sales Manager
